channel.title: Masking item names for servers as well?
channel.description:
well.. ive seen in a pserv someone changed the name "coins" to "shits". i ve doe the same thing with the abyssal whip, shown here: [URL=http://img179.imageshack.us/my.php?image=modcityto8.jpg][IMG]http://img179.imageshack.us/img179/2590/modcityto8.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
even though it says t3h pwnz0r whip then u try to wield it the option is "wield abyssal whip".
ne ideas?

item.title: Masking item names for servers as well?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r0fz4mmy pk3r0fz4mmy
item.description:
@pk3r0fz4mmy wrote:

aah, i see =\

how dumb am i…

Read full topic

item.title: Masking item names for servers as well?
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

That is how it is. You cannot change it fully because it is in the Cache.

Read full topic

thats what i did… the problem is it only shows it once you actually wield it.

item.title: Masking item names for servers as well?
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Open item.cfg and change the name it says for the item. Then compile and runserver.

Read full topic
